ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: Like I said in the first paragraph of the original post, I posted this petition to get some discussion going since there wasn t much posting going on today.
ygData.messageBody:
Like I said in the first paragraph of the original post, I posted this
"petition" to get some discussion going since there wasn't much posting
going on today. I made up the potential replacement songs off the fly. I
was hoping some of the more experienced players could come up with better
ideas. However, if everyone is fine with keeping the 14th level song as it
is then fine by me. One thing to remember, Verant does modify/replace
spells when the situation warrants it. Look back at the two most recent big
patches and see how many existing spells were replaced with different ones.
Asking them to replace our 14th level song is not beyond reason.

We discussed a general bard petition last week. Seems to me the vote was
split 50/50 if we even needed to worry about it. Is anyone going to
volunteer to draft one up or is it a dead issue?

Galtin of E'ci

> I agree, this petition is somewhat uncalled for. we allready have a heal
> song and stamina song, dont even think about getting a combined one. Thats
> simply pulling teeth.
>
> lev 34 bard that is tired of petitions which address the wrong things.
> If you want to petition about something, petition about thinks like skills
> that cap at 40, utterly useless like hide & forage. Our stick drum will
> supposedly be fixed in the next graphical patch.
>
>
